programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Judges Decide " - In the season premiere we meet 18 new designers as they arrive in NYC and face one final audition in front of the judges. After three designers are cut right away, the remaining 15 are asked to design a spring look from fabrics they are given. Amanda Valentine, from season 11, returns as the "fan favorite" and 16th designer. In the season premiere we meet 18 new designers as they arrive in NYC and face one final audition in front of the judges. After three designers are cut right away, the remaining 15 are asked to design a spring look from fabrics they are given. Amanda Valentine, from season 11, returns as the "fan favorite" and 16th designer.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Unconventional Movie Nite!" - The designers are excited when they are taken to a movie theatre for their next challenge, but nerves set in when Tim explains they will be working in teams...with unconventional materials! In groups of three, the designers must create a cohesive collection using items that would normally be found in a movie theatre.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Welcome To The Future" - In celebration of Marie Claire's 20th anniversary, the designers are asked to make a look that could be worn twenty years in the future in the magazine. The catch? They have to look to the past...20 years to be exact, for inspiration.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "A Suitable Twist" - After a field trip to Red Robin, the designers are challenged to take an all-American staple, a men's suit, and transform it into a high fashion women's look. The suits they are given are from all different fashion eras, and the winner of the last challenge is asked to choose for the rest of the competitors.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Klum of Doom" - Heidi asks the designers to create a red carpet look that she could wear to the Creative Arts Emmys. When Heidi is less than pleased in the workroom, she tells most of the designers to start over. On the Runway, two designers are eliminated.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Rock The Wedding" - For the second Team Challenge of the season, the designers work in pairs to create looks that could be worn for a "nontraditional wedding." They must design one look for the ceremony, and one for the reception. Dita Von Teese introduces the challenge and serves as guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Priceless Runway" - With the help of Chopard, the designers are asked to create an extravagant eveningwear piece inspired by jewelry of their choosing. They also draw inspiration from the Charles James exhibit at the MET, and Tim decides to use his "Tim Gunn Save" on one designer.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Rainway" - Inspired by the latest Samsung Curved TV, the designers are asked to create avant-garde pieces that look good from every angle. The twist? The pieces also have to walk the Runway...in the rain! The designers have two days to put together a look that can wow the judges and withstand a "Rainway."

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "American Girl Doll" - After a field trip to the American Girl Store, the designers are asked to create a modern look for a young girl, inspired by the "Beforever" American Doll collection. The designers work with young girls as their models for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Highest Bidder" - The designers are taken to a large warehouse and told that for their next challenge, they will have to bid on storage units in order to obtain their materials. The designers work in teams of two to make a two-piece cohesive collection from the materials they buy. On the second day of their two-day challenge, Tim presents the designers with the task of designing one more look. When the judges cannot decide who to eliminate on the Runway, two designers face off in a one-hour showdown.

programme.title: El Matadero
programme.desc: Alicia encounters a potential ally. Ofelia fights for survival, while Nick uses his skillset for profit in the apocalypse.

programme.title: Things Bad Begun
programme.desc: Strand's motives are made clear when Nick discovers a new threat descending on the dam. Madison faces a horrifying revelation.

programme.title: Sleigh Ride
programme.desc: Strand's loyalty is tested when the dam clashes with an adversary. The Clark family is pushed to new extremes as Madison reckons with her past.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: A highly dysfunctional blended family is forced together when they realize a reported virus is actually the onset of the undead apocalypse.

programme.title: Death Valley: Dante's View
programme.desc: Balthazar Getty and Norman Reedus spend a night in Las Vegas and then ride out to Death Valley, enjoying the epic scenery.

programme.title: The Making Of Season 4 of The Walking Dead: Volume 1
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with the cast and creators for an Inside look at how season four was created. Season 4, Episodes 1 to 5.

programme.title: Friday Night In with The Morgans: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Morgans check in with their friends Mark Duplass and Katie Aselton, Colman Domingo, a local community organizer, plus a viewer at home, all appearing via video chat.

programme.title: East
programme.desc: Alexandria is alerted after realizing someone is missing. Several search parties will venture out, but what they find isn't what they're hoping for.

programme.title: Talking Dead on "East"
programme.desc: Yvette Nicole Brown, Denise Huth & a surprise cast member discuss the episode, "East," from The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Blood In The Streets
programme.desc: A family in distress boards the Abigail. Strand branches off and his past begins to emerge. Nick searches for an associate of Strand's.

programme.title: Sinister Squad
programme.desc: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death's Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains is coerced into fighting in the modern world, but these baddies must learn to keep their true wickedness at bay if they want any chance at freedom.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E1 | Cheating Death
programme.desc: A man who was buried alive under snow and escaped by drinking beer a construction worker who survived being run over by a steamroller and a girl who was saved from choking to death by a car crash.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E2 | Mixed Up in Crime
programme.desc: A person is shot at close range and coughs up the bullet and a German businessman wakes up and finds his kidney is missing.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E3 | It Seemed Like a Clever Idea
programme.desc: A family whose Santa got stuck in the chimney a woman who dried her poodle in a microwave and a man who designed his own flying machine.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E4 | No Excuses for Stupidity
programme.desc: Streakers find out they have no ride home and a hunting dog retrieves a lit stick of dynamite.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E5 | Fickle Finger of Fate
programme.desc: A scuba diver who died from burns while in his wet suit and a man who was unaware that he had a broken neck for 60 years.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S1 E6 | What a Way to Go
programme.desc: An incident involving sharp pencils results in a fatality a woman is turned inside out by a vacuum toilet and a stag night leads to a groom's death.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Drama
programme.desc: There may be one defining human feature across the planet and it may be our love of drama.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E7 | Lynsey Quy
programme.desc: When a wife and mother of two mysteriously disappears on Christmas Day, psychic Joe Power believes that her remains can be found in the beach community where she lived, and a new police detective on the case gets a confession from the killer.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E8 | Mick Hughes
programme.desc: Psychic Angela McGee assists the investigation of the scene after a man is attacked and bleeds to death in the living quarters above his pub.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E9 | Darryl Cozart
programme.desc: When a family man disappears one night after work, psychic Mary Ellen Rodrigues helps police by describing his murder to an officer who comes into her shop.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E10 | Southern Organs Case
programme.desc: Dedicated psychic Robert Cracknell helps journalist Norman Luck track down two con men in Scotland who perpetrated a fraud involving church organs.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E11 | Baton Rouge

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E12 | Jacqueline Poole
programme.desc: Psychic Christine Holohan helps police with clues to the death of young Jacqueline Poole, who was assaulted and strangled in her home.

programme.title: The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course
programme.desc: Steve Irwin makes his big-screen debut with his most perilous adventure yet! To save a large crocodile from an angry rancher who intends to kill it for preying on her cattle, Steve and his wife Terri set out on a dangerous journey through the outback to nab the big fella and relocate him to a safe river. But what they don't know is that the angry reptile has swallowed a top-secret U.S. satellite tracking beacon, making them all targets of American CIA agents! Crikey! David Wenham also stars.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz), a high school student and newly-recruited junior CIA agent, is on his first mission to stop an evil mastermind from misusing technology created by a brilliant scientist, Dr. Connors (Martin Donovan), to rule the world. The agency sends Cody to work undercover at a private school where Connors' daughter, Natalie (Hilary Duff), is a student however, he's awkward around girls and off to a rough start. Can Cody save the world, get the girl...and not miss curfew?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
programme.desc: When Spike reveals the identity of the mystery man she's been dating, Emma is shocked. Mr. Simpson - her teacher! Emma claims she’s okay with it, but if that’s true, why is suddenly being so rude to Mr. Simpson?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Karma Chameleon
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year never happened!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Weird Science
programme.desc: It's Science Fair time at Degrassi. Emma’s a serious contender for first prize, but when the results of her experiment don't fall in line with her hypothesis, she's in a panic.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Drive
programme.desc: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own – and even have the guys over! programme.title: An Open Conversation about Kanye West

programme.title: Joji and Rich Brian Make International Burgers with Chef Ludo
programme.desc: Last year, chef Ludo Lefebvre taught Joji and Rich Brian how to make the perfect omelet. But can the boys finally impress their mentor by serving him a couple of tasty burgers? After learning the secrets behind Le Big Mec-Ludo's legendary French-twist on a double cheeseburger-Brian and Joji go head-to-head in an international burger battle for the ages. Which burger will Ludo choose: Brian's satay-and-sambal-slathered creation, or Joji's teriyaki-and-shrimp-topped monstrosity?

programme.title: Racks Most Expensive Supreme Purchase & Air Jordan 4 Levi's!
programme.desc: On this episode Tony sits down with Racks and answer some view questions. Racks shares his most expensive Supreme purchase and break down his thoughts on the Nike Zoom Fly Mercurial sneakers and the Air Jordan 4 Levi's in the black and white colorway.

programme.title: NIKI and Inga Lam Share Indomie Noodle Hacks
programme.desc: Indomie is one of Indonesia's most beloved cultural exports. But what happens when you use mie goreng to make burgers and chocolate bars? Indonesian icon NIKI has been an Indomie purist since day one, but today she's teaming up with BuzzFeed's Inga Lam in the hopes of broadening her stir-fried noodle horizons. Together, NIKI and Ingra run through a few of their favorite ways to trick out a pack of instant noodles. Which mie goreng metamorphosis is NIKI's favorite?

programme.title: South LA's African American Taco Movement
programme.desc: Miss Info meets a group of young, charismatic African-American entrepreneurs from Watts, South L.A, and Compton who are shaking up the taco scene, finding new meaning in L.A.'s iconic street food. Find out how upstarts like All Flavor No Grease and Taco Mell are making a name for themselves, and why rapper Casey Veggies says, "The food game turned into the rap game."

programme.title: Joji and Sean Evans Review Japanese Snacks
programme.desc: Joji is here to help Sean Evans navigate the often overwhelming world of the Japanese convenience store. Born and raised in Japan, the 88rising crooner takes our host on a snack-fueled journey through the Land of the Rising Sun.

programme.title: How New Orleans Birthed a Vietnamese Po Boy Movement
programme.desc: We head to New Orleans. Forty years ago, Vietnamese migration to NOLA introduced bánh mì to po' boy country. Now, the lines between two iconic sandwiches are blurring. To find out what happens when you mash up the Mississippi Delta and the Mekong Delta, we spoke to New Orleans legend Curren$y, Times-Picayune writer Brett Anderson, and Banh Mi Boys chef Peter Nguyen.

programme.title: Mike Chen and Claire Saffitz Explore Japanese Street Food and Candy
programme.desc: Japan Village is a 20,000-square-foot food hall in Brooklyn's Industry City, and Reina Scully is ready to explore every corner. But no food tour is complete without a few friends. Joining Reina on her adventure is Strictly Dumpling's Mike Chen, Bon Appétit's Claire Saffitz, and NYC restaurateur Sakura Yagi.

programme.title: Wagyu 101 with Sean Evans and Philip DeFranco
programme.desc: Japan is home to some of the world's most coveted cuts of meat. But what makes wagyu so expensive? From an $85 wagyu sando with Hot Ones host Sean Evans, to a $350 wagyu steak with her old boss Philip DeFranco, Reina Scully is eating her way through NYC's most decadent hunks of Japanese beef with a couple of friends. But what gives wagyu its famously marbled fat? And what's the deal with American wagyu popping up at restaurants?

programme.title: WWE Star Asuka Eats Japanese Eel
programme.desc: Eel is one of the most traditional ingredients in Japanese cooking. But in the U.S., the delicacy is still largely misunderstood. On this episode of Gochi Gang, Reina Scully is embarking on an eel-eating adventure. First, Chef Hiroki Fukushima gives Reina a crash course in the preparation of unagi, or freshwater eel, at Unagi Aburi Ittetsu. And later, Reina teams up with WWE superstar and sushi obsessive Asuka for an omakase experience centered around anago, unagi's saltwater cousin.

programme.title: Frank Pinello and Mark Iacono Eat "Japanese Pasta"
programme.desc: Last week, Reina Scully ate her way through three of Japan's most recognizable ramen styles. But today, she's on a mission to see where ramen is going next. Her first stop is Niche, where chefs Frank Pinello, Mark Iacono, Carlo Carciotto, and Anthony Vitolo are ready to try mazemen, a saucy, brothless style of ramen. Chef Shigetoshi "Jack" Nakamura calls this dish "Japanese pasta"-but will his cheese and bacon-topped noodles satisfy some of NYC's most beloved Italian-American chefs?

programme.title: Meek Mill & Lil Baby Albums, Jay Explains 'What's Free' Line, Em's 'Kick Off'
programme.desc: Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks review the latest projects released by Meek Mill and Lil Baby. After dropping 'Wins & Loses' in 2017, Meek returned last week with the release of his fourth studio album, 'Championships.' The new LP, which features a star-studded line-up of guest appearances, is highlighted by the Jay-Z and Rick Ross-assisted track, "What's Free," as well as the Drake and Meek collab joint "Going Bad.

programme.title: Kanye Still Obsessing About Drake, Bobby Shmurda Dropping a Tape From Prison?
programme.desc: On Tuesday's (Jan. 28) episode of #EverydayStruggle, Nadeska, Wayno and DJ Akademiks continue to mourn the loss of legendary basketball player Kobe Bryant, and his 13-year-old daughter Gianna Bryant. The crew shares the latest updates of the helicopter accident investigation, and also speak on 50 Cent announcing that Kobe's death has made him a changed man.

programme.title: Matty Matheson and Sean Evans Have a Poutine Showdown
programme.desc: Poutine is a Montreal staple-a glorious combination of fries, cheese curds, and gravy that ranks as one of the world's great hangover cures.

programme.title: Jimmy Fallon Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Complex's Joe La Puma goes Sneaker Shopping with the host of the Tonight Show, Jimmy Fallon, at Flight Club in New York City to talk about his history in sneakers, getting dissed by Barneys' employees back in the day, and Hasan Minhaj hooking him up with Air Jordan 1s.

programme.title: Tory Lanez Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Tory Lanez goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in Los Angeles and talks his love for the Air Jordan VI, why he looks up to Vince Carter, and growing up in Toronto.

programme.title: Lawrence Taylor Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: New York Giants legend Lawrence Taylor goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Kith in Miami and talks about playing golf with Michael Jordan, his game worn cleats selling for $11,000, and Eli Manning's golf handicap.

programme.title: Carmelo Anthony Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Carmelo Anthony goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe la Puma at Saint Alfred in Chicago and talks his favorite signature NBA sneakers growing up, getting his own Air Jordan PEs, and the importance of the Air Jordan X "Wings" and its influence from Chicago.

programme.title: Tracy Morgan Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Tracy Morgan goes Sneaker Shopping with Joe La Puma at Flight Club in New York City and talks about his love of classic footwear, the one time he got a pair of sneakers stolen from him and his favorite courtside footwear.

programme.title: Pop Smoke Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Pop Smoke goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about playing basketball in high school, the first Air Jordans he owned, and going to Paris Fashion Week and connecting with Virgil Abloh and Louis Vuitton.

programme.title: Marcus Jordan Reveals Never-Before-Seen Air Jordans
programme.desc: Full Size Run is Sole Collector's weekly sneaker talk and debate show featuring co-hosts Brendan Dunne, Matt Welty, and Trinidad James, and this week they're joined by Marcus Jordan, the CEO of Trophy Room and Michael Jordan's son. He tells crazy stories about his father, shows off never-seen-before Air Jordans, and talks about running a sneaker store.

programme.title: Lil Tjay Tried to Spend $20,000 on Sneakers
programme.desc: Full Size Run is Sole Collector's weekly sneaker talk and debate show featuring co-hosts Brendan Dunne, Matt Welty, and Trinidad James, and this week they're joined by Bronx rapper LiL Tjay and he talks about trying to buy his friends $20k worth of sneakers, his favorite sneakers growing up, and his love of designer sneakers.

programme.title: How BMX Star Nigel Sylvester Landed His Own Air Jordan
programme.desc: Full Size Run is Sole Collector's weekly sneaker talk and debate show featuring co-hosts Brendan Dunne, Matt Welty, and Trinidad James, and this week they're joined by pro BMX rider Nigel Sylvester for the Season 5 premiere to talk about how he got into sneakers, how he got his own Air Jordan and Nike SB collaborations, and more.

programme.title: Strut
programme.desc: In each episode of Strut, we watch Eddie and her friends transform through their risky new endeavor in unexpected positive ways. Eddie is a geeky porn editor whose low self-confidence has turned her into a 26-year-old hermit. Her friends, Eva (an unemployed artist), Lucy (an intern), and Chandaleer (a trainwreck/fashion model) vow to save her from her unhealthy solitude. When the friends decide to start a high-end escorting agency to earn more money, they convince skeptical Eddie to help them build their business and lift her self-esteem. Together they successfully navigate the adrenaline-fueled escorting industry with Eddie as their CEO and fellow sex worker.

programme.title: South Beach On Heels
programme.desc: This award-winning documentary explores the on and offstage lives of eight hard-working drag entertainers. Follow Carmen Carrera, Latrice Royale, and other performers as they search for love, family, and acceptance in an industry built on big hair, big dreams and illusion.

programme.title: Becoming Queen
programme.desc: There has never been a band like Queen, and there never will again. Take a twenty year ride with the people who knew them best.

programme.title: The Drag Roast Of Heklina
programme.desc: S1 E1 | Check your political correctness at the door and bring your finest, biggest wig for a raucous, no-holds-barred roast of one of San Francisco's favorite larger-than-life drag personalities, the one and only Heklina—aka Stefan Grygelko. This Revry Original special features such roasters as Jackie Beat, Julie Brown (Clueless), Peaches Christ, Sister Roma, Alaska Thunderf*ck, and Jinkx Monsoon.

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Allen Ginsberg is a poet, counter-culture adventurer and chronicler of the Beat Generation. In his famously confessional style, Ginsberg recounts his life and search for personal liberation that led to the most timeless and electrifying work of his career, the poem HOWL. Meanwhile, in a San Francisco courtroom, HOWL is on trial. Prosecutor Ralph McIntosh sets out to prove that the book should be banned, while defense attorney Jake Ehrlich argues for freedom of speech and creative expression.

programme.title: Hot Trash
programme.desc: S1 E1 | D'Arcy dishes the dirt about the Capitol Insurrection, Pence's fly, and much, much, more! D'Arcy dishes the dirt about Armie Hammer, Sex and the City, #BussitChallenge, and more!

programme.title: Dykes, Camera, Action!
programme.desc: Lesbians didn't always get to see themselves on screen, but over time they built visibility and transformed the social imagination about queerness. Filmmakers Barbara Hammer, Su Friedrich, Rose Troche, Cheryl Dunye, Desiree Akhavan, film critic B. Ruby Rich, and others share moving and often hilarious stories from their lives and discuss how they've expressed queer identity through film.

programme.desc: When the LAPD's elite Special Investigations Squad (SIS) is assigned a high-profile quadruple homicide, veteran detective Eldon Perry (Kurt Russell) takes the case. Known for his tough street tactics and a fiery temper, Eldon also tutors rookie Bobby Keough (Scott Speedman) in the grim realities of police intimidation and corruption. While navigating the tumultuous neighborhoods of South Central L.A., Perry and Keough must track down the cold-blooded killers as well as face their own demons - demons that prove more ruthless than the criminals they pursue.

programme.title: Miami Blues
programme.desc: Fred Ward, Alec Baldwin and Jennifer Jason Leigh star in this deliciously offbeat black comedy. Veteran criminal Frederick Frenger, Jr. (Alec Baldwin) has moved to Miami to get a fresh start... at robbing a whole new set of people. But when his wife (Jennifer Jason Leigh) begins to suspect his criminal behavior, and a denture-wearing, obsessed cop (Fred Ward) begins to close in, he will need a lot more than luck and a bogus badge to escape a crossfire hotter than the barrel of a smoking gun!

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Best Friends Show" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "NY vs LA Show" - Over the course of three days, six contestants compete against each other in three stunts designed to test them both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Fire Fear Factor" - Teams hang from a cargo net dangling from a helicopter, while their opponents fire water cannons at them eating the hottest peppers on the planet.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Heli Platform to Platform Jump, Barber Shop, Container Launch" - This episode features four co-ed pairs competing as teams. In the first stunt, both team members leap back and forth between two platforms hanging from helicopters with each person transferring up to 10 flags from one platform to the other and then jumping in the water. The three teams to get highest flag total will advance to the next round. In the second stunt one team member is seated in a barber chair and their partner spins them. When the chair stops, they have to get whichever haircut their head was pointing to. There are six haircuts they can get. Teams would advance to the finals if both members got their designated haircuts. In the finale a crane lifts a large container to 200 feet in the air, both team members have to climb rope ladders hanging from the container. Once they reach the container, they both have to scale a narrow ledge on the side, collect two Allen wrenches, and climb another ladder to the top. Once on top, they have to use the wrenches to unscrew hatches and climb down into the container. When they were both inside, they have to touch two pieces of a live wire together in order to blow themselves out of the container and into the water below. The team to complete this stunt the fastest would be the Fear Factor Champions at winning $50,000. This week competing in the Home Invasion is the Frederickson family of Hagerstown, Maryland.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Farm Fear Factor" - Contestants crawl through a pigsty and find themselves being dragged behind a tractor. Host Joe Rogan.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Heist Fear Factor" - Contestants are challenged to an extremely fast helicopter stunt, to crawl through a vent system filled with rats, spiders and fire, and to retrieve a prize from a sunken armoured car.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Psycho Fear Factor Episode 1" - Six couples compete in a variety of stunts while living together in the Bates Motel.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Total Wipeout

programme.title: The Almost Impossible Gameshow

programme.title: Total Wipeout

There is a cash prize waiting for the winner, plus a shiny trophy, a lifetime of amusing anecdotes, and a nickname from host Richard Hammond.

programme.title: Total Wipeout

This episode sees the return of the finalists from across the series as they compete for the ultimate title, 'Champions of Champions'. They pit themselves against some of the hardest obstacles we've ever witnessed on their journey to get to the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Total Wipeout

programme.title: Impact Wrestling - August 31, 2017
programme.desc: Brand new GFW Global Champion Eli Drake has plans to celebrate his recent accomplishment in the IMPACT Zone, but unexpected visitors make their way to the ring. The Knockouts Division continues to heat up with the return of Taryn Terrell. And, we figure out how Bobby Lashley plans to rebound after a gut-wrenching loss last week.

programme.title: Impact Wrestling - September 7, 2017
programme.desc: Two much anticipated tag team matches create all of the buzz this week on IMPACT Wrestling. First, we witness X-Division legends Petey Williams and Sonjay Dutt team up to take on Trevor Lee and Caleb Konley. Then we watch Knockouts action as Taryn Terrell and Sienna team up against Allie and Gail Kim. But while some are battling in the IMPACT Zone, other Stars like Moose, Bobby Lashley, and Eddie Edwards head to countries like Mexico and Japan to fight. We also see the GFW Global Champion, Eli Drake, defend his Title for the first time against the one and only âRebornâ Matt Sydal. programme.title: Make this Tonight
programme.desc: Chef Bricia is here to show you how easy making mole at home can be! This Oaxacan masterpiece is a recipe straight from her family’s famous restaurant, Guelagatza, and she’s sharing it with you tonight! And to make the night even more scrumptious, she’s going to use it to top everyone’s favorite - cheese-y enchiladas with homemade tortilla chips! Wash it down with a crisp Cucumber Margarita and you are good to go. Pay close attention and learn the fundamentals of a classic Oaxacan dish tonight!

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Dried beans are the most affordable and healthy way to prepare them, with very little effort to boot. Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. We also take a field trip to the grocery store to shop the bulk aisle where those dried beans live. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so don’t be scared to eat too many. Remember, they’re good for your heart.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Test cook Christie Morrison and host Julia Collin Davison reveal the steps to making a showstopping Blueberry Jam Cake. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews toasters with host Bridget Lancaster.

programme.title: Italian Comfort Food Classics
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof cooks host Julia Collin Davison a surprising Italian classic: Chicago Thin-Crust Pizza with Homemade Italian Sausage. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a live taste test of jarred pasta sauce. Finally, test cook Lawman Johnson and host Bridget reveal the secrets to a perfect Pasta Fagioli.

programme.title: When Only Chocolate Will Do
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a show-stopping Mississippi Mud Pie. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his pick for the best miniature food processor on the market. And Finally, Bridget reveals the secrets to making Whoopie Pies right at home.

programme.title: Pork and Pierogi
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster prepare a show-stopping special occasion Cider-Braised Pork Roast. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a sauerkraut tasting. Finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison the secrets to tackling authentic Pittsburgh-style Potato-Cheddar Pierogi at home.

programme.title: Ballpark Classics
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison grill up Sausage and Peppers. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of whole-wheat sandwich bread. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews disposable plates. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison makes Julia the best Ballpark Pretzels.

programme.title: Tristate Treats
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make the ultimate New Jersey Crumb Buns. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews nonstick skillets. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Julia a streamlined recipe for Cheese Blintzes with Raspberry Sauce.

programme.title: Baked Alaska Showstopper
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster head into the test kitchen to uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Baked Alaska at home. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews ice cream machines in the Equipment Corner. Next, science expert Dan Souza reveals the science of insulation and thermodynamics at work in Baked Alaska. And finally, gadget expert Lisa McManus shares the best offset spatulas.

programme.title: The Ultimate Sticky Buns
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster head into the test kitchen to uncover the secrets to making the ultimate Sticky Buns at home. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of Almond Butter. And finally, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews waffle irons in the equipment corner.

programme.title: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Happy holidays! Join the America's Test Kitchen cast as they share their favorite holiday recipes and memories.

programme.title: Modern Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Modern Weeknight Meals Test cook Becky Hays makes Bridget the perfect One-Hour Broiled Chicken and Pan Sauce. In the Equipment Corner, expert Adam Ried reviews blenders, and then test cook Tim Chin wraps up the episode by making Julia the ultimate Modern Cauliflower Gratin.

programme.title: The Perfect Cake
programme.desc: Bridget and Julia make the perfect Gingerbread Layer Cake and Keith Makes Sticky Toffee Pudding Cakes.

programme.title: Pork Chops and Oven Fries
programme.desc: In this episode, test cook Elle Simone makes Bridget the ultimate Deviled Pork Chops. Then tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of dark chocolate chips, and gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews kids' oven mitts. Science expert Dan Souza reveals the science behind non-Newtonian fluids, and test cook Lan Lam makes the perfect Thick-Cut Oven Fries.

programme.title: Weekend Brunch
programme.desc: Our sour cream coffee cake and light, flavorful fruit salads transform weekend brunch into an indulgent meal.

programme.title: Party Foods
programme.desc: Who doesn't like a plate of good nachos or Buffalo wings? We discover when you can use supermarket products versus when only good, fresh ingredients will do. A simple, sweet-tart sangria finishes our party menu.

programme.title: New Orleans Menu
programme.desc: Watch as we figure out the best recipes for two New Orleans favorites-Jambalaya and bananas Foster.

programme.title: Truck Stop Favorites
programme.desc: Truckers often know where to find the best home-style cooking. After long days on the road, most would rather tuck into real food, prepared from scratch, than the prefab fast-food fare. And what could be better than chicken-fried steak with cream gravy and real coconut cream pie?

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table - Isla Mujeres Inspired
programme.desc: Known for white sand beaches, crystal clear turquoise waters and the friendliest locals in the Mexican Caribbean, Isla Mujeres is a haven for people from all over the world. Pati takes a day to explore and try the local delicacy, Tikin Xic. Back home, Pati prepares her own version to share with her boys, along with roasted broccoli and cauliflower and a dessert wrapped in a crispy wafer roll.

programme.title: A Taste of History - The Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Chef Staib journeys down the Santa Fe trail through Kansas to discover where travelers regrouped before the next perilous leg of their journey. Recipes like steamed venison pudding and bison stew are prepared at a local stagecoach stop.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - The Real Chefs Garden
programme.desc: In this episode we experience Seattle’s most pure, organic, direct and delicious “Farm to Table” experience with Chef Brian Scheehser. He practices sustainable farming in his own three‐acre garden, with the hand of a farmer and the meticulous nature of a chef. Part Chef‐Part Farmer, Scheehser offers expert tips on cooking and insight on how to grow your garden.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Rice Chronicles
programme.desc: Rice, the bread and butter of the Korean table is explored from Busan, Korea’s second largest city, all the way to Seoul. Along the way, Marja and her dear friend, the actress Heather Graham, learn about instant rice, tteok (a pasta-like ingredient made of ground rice) and visit Bibigo, a new chain of contemporary restaurants serving fresh variations of bibimbap.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Jean-Claude Poilevey, David Machado, and Norman Love
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Lyonnaise Salad, Halibut Cheeks with Potatoes and Artichoke, and Banana-Chocolate Tart with Malted Milk Ice Cream. Restaurants include: Le Bouchon in Chicago, Pazzo Ristorante in Portland, and The Ritz-Carlton in Naples.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Apples
programme.desc: See Apples in a new light when served with Green Tea Pork Tenderloin, Apple and Cranberry Cobbler and a Late Summer Superfoods Salad.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - China & Korea
programme.desc: Two culinary powerhouses come together, as Martin and his guest, barbeque master Rick Browne, explore the difference between Korean and Chinese flavours to create these quick and easy dishes.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - Lovers Only El Barzon The Rattlesnake Club
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Barbara Johnson, Jarod Robert and Elizabeth Kraft, who review upscale sandwiches and salads at Lovers Only Mexican and Italian specialties a la Chef Norberto Garita at El Barzon and steaks and seafood at the Rattlesnake Club located on the Detroit Riverfront.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Fruit Soufflé Omelet
programme.desc: Use low-fat egg substitute in a sweet fruit omelet topped with creamy orange sauce or a mushroom and spinach omelet with fresh dill and Parmesan cheese.

programme.title: A Taste of History - Cuisine of the Equator
programme.desc: Chef Staib travels to the highlands of Ecuador where local ingredients and indigenous culture combine with that of the Spanish conquistadors to create something truly unique. Recipes like cuy, cevichocho, and helados de paila are prepared by local chefs.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - Food Defines Family
programme.desc: Chef Charles Phan is the visionary behind San Francisco’s renowned Slanted Door. Chef and his kids head to the coast where farmer Joe Schirmer is harvesting unique Asian ingredients. The family gathers and sells, together at the Farm Market. Then, back in the kitchen the chef and his kids whip up Vietnamese, Thai, and Chinese specialties with an all American twist.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Kimchi Chronicles Begin
programme.desc: An introduction to the basics of Korean cooking starting with, of course, kimchi. Jean-Georges and Marja are joined in the kitchen by their real-life neighbors, actors Hugh and Deb Jackman. Together they prepare two iconic Korean dishes—bibimbap and beef bulgogi and check out barbeque that can rival Texas.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Will Greenwood, Thierry Rautureau, and Lisa Anderson
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Scallop Salad, Sturgeon on a Citrus-Tomato Stew, and Pineapple Brown Sugar Crisp. Restaurants include: Sunset Grill in Nashville, Rover’s in Seattle, and Gerard’s Downtown in New Orleans.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Nuts
programme.desc: Beyond the snack table, use nuts in Spaghetti Squash Salad with walnuts, Grilled Shrimp and Almonds and Fennel Salad with Walnuts.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Home Cooking
programme.desc: No time? No problem! Martin proves you don’t need to spend hours in the kitchen to make a great, home-cooked meal.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - Brome Modern Eatery Coop Caribbean Fusion Otus Supply
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Nathan Hochstein, Mari Nafsou and Mary Burkhardt, who review melt-in-your-mouth burgers and other favorites at the Brome Modern Eatery signature Caribbean and Asian specialties from celebrity Chef Max Hardy at the Coop Caribbean Fusion and upscale eats of pork, fish, boar and more at Otus Supply.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Macaroni and Cheese
programme.desc: Graham shows how to create a golden sweet potato-cheese puree that’s perfect for macaroni noodles or broccoli and cauliflower au gratin.

programme.title: Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Tiki Party
programme.desc: Roy and Chuck enjoy an afternoon of research for a 'Tiki' themed backyard party. An unpredictable afternoon of tropical bliss ensues when they visit the Tommy Bahama Bar, the La Mariana Yacht Club, Alan Wong's Pineapple Room, and the famous Halekulani for Mai Tais, pineapple martinis and laughter. Chuck also joins Roy in the kitchen to prepare his succulent lamb chop pupu.

programme.title: Refugee Chef S01 E02 - Hmong and Here
programme.desc: Promotional Content

programme.title: Refugee Chef - Afghan at Last
programme.desc: For 28 years, Javad Ghaderi kept his Afghan nationality a secret. He was an asylum seeker for all of those years, and endured deportation 3 times. It was food that helped him at critical junctions, and now he is using Persian cuisine to solidify new friendships with locals in Wollongong, Australia.

programme.title: Kung Fu Motion - Hip Hop Stilts
programme.desc: Harry doesn't know how to stilt walk but within 5 days he will have to crash course the basics and advance to hip-hop stilt-walking in order to perform to a critical audience in China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Motion - Rolling Lamp
programme.desc: Putting to the test all his muscles including scalp and tongue, Harry must balance a bowl of burning oil on his head while making a mockery of himself in a Sichuan opera.

programme.title: Kung Fu Motion - Lion Dance
programme.desc: Harry has to hold a horse stance, move like a cat and capture the spirit of the lion before he is allowed to perform Lion Dancing at a troupe's 190th anniversary celebrations.

programme.title: Kung Fu Motion - Man Juggling
programme.desc: Harry joins the Shandong Acrobatic Troupe famous for juggling with their feet fellow team mates to form a towering pyramid of men.

programme.title: Kung Fu Motion - Beijing Opera
programme.desc: Harry faces his toughest challenge yet as he puts aside his free-styling ways to conform to the precision moves required of the Monkey King character in Beijing Opera.

programme.title: Concord Country Cape | Solid Foundation

programme.title: Concord Country Cape | Dormer Day
programme.desc: The old foundation is transitioned to the new. Natural stone is cut into veneers. A new beam is installed on the back dormer for more headroom. Homeowner Megan and her interior designer look at tile.

programme.title: Ask This Old House | Wood Floors, DIY Ice Rink

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Stone Cold Pavers
programme.desc: Jenn and the homeowners select pavers for hardscape. Tommy and Norm install a skylight in the bathroom, while the sewer line and water main are completely replaced out front. The original foundation is also repaired.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Eight Is Enough Stairways
programme.desc: Tommy teaches Kevin how to calculate the riser height for a set of stairs. The foundation is insulated with a DIY foam system. Radiant heat is installed, and Norm and Richard head to Santa Fe to visit the project they did 30 years ago.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Can We Cantilever
programme.desc: Tommy shows Kevin the careful process of installing rafters for a cantilevered roof. Inside, Richard solves a venting problem for the kitchen sink before tackling the AC ductwork puzzle. Later, Tommy and Kevin install snow cleats on the roof.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | What's the Miter with the Corner
programme.desc: Mark McCullough rebuilds a century old Puddingstone wall. Tommy and Kevin revisit the 2005 Cambridge modern project. Electrician Heath Eastman installs trimless LED recessed lights. Large tanks are installed under the driveway for rain water runoff.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | See Glass
programme.desc: Kevin travels to the Midwest to see the manufacturing of plate glass and windows. Back in Brookline, Mauro teaches Kevin some cold weather painting tricks. Radiant heat is installed under the driveway, while the patio is installed in the front.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Attack of the Giant Tile
programme.desc: Mark Ferrante lays giant porcelain tile in the main living spaces of the house. Kevin and Richard head to sunny Key West to visit the 20th anniversary project. Back in Brookline, a hanging retro fireplace and modern kitchen cabinets are installed.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Finally Finishes
programme.desc: Finishing touches abound as the project wraps up: closet systems, modern baseboards and a linear wall drain in the master shower are all installed. Homeowner Sunil selects door hardware and Nathan Gilbert installs floating bathroom vanities.

programme.title: Brookline Mid-century Modern House | Taking Modern Back to the Future
programme.desc: After months of hard work, the lackluster mid-century box is a modern marvel once again. Kevin, Tommy and Richard tour the home and review all the special features that went into this beautiful space Sunil and Neha can now call home.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 4 Chefs Compete" - The final four contestants prepare lunch for surprise guests: eighty picky pregnant moms. The chef whose dish they favor wins a $1,000 shopping spree. The others must clean up.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 3 Chefs Compete" - Chef Ramsay prepares breakfast for the remaining chefs, then asks them to replicate the dish. Later, Ramsay sabotages the dinner service to see how the contestants react to adversity.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 2 Chefs Compete" - The two finalists visit Chef Ramsay's New York City restaurant, where their signature dishes are judged by the executive chefs of Ramsay's other restaurants.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, Winner Announced" - The fourth season comes to a close as the finalists work together with previously eliminated contestants for the last dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 16 Chefs Compete" - Sixteen professional chefs compete for an executive chef position at the Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa in Atlantic City. The contestants must wow Chef Ramsay with their signature dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 15 Chefs Compete" - Following the previous night's dinner service disaster, Chef Ramsay presents the aspiring chefs with the food that they wasted.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 5, 14 Chefs Compete" - The fourteen remaining chefs visit a meat locker to learn about various cuts of beef, then put their knowledge into practice when Hell's Kitchen becomes a steak house for the night.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen

programme.desc: Chef Ramsay helps out a family-run Mexican restaurant called Fiesta Sunrise — which is in deep financial trouble and extremely dirty. Can Ramsay get the family on the path to success?

programme.title: Verdad Oculta: Episodio 41
programme.desc: Después de la caída de un infame narco-líder, el coronel Diana está lista para tomarse un descanso de la policía y trabajar para arreglar su matrimonio. Su jefe, sin embargo, tiene otros planes y le asigna al coronel Diana su mayor misión hasta la fecha: desmantelar "el Clan del Norte" dirigido por los hermanos Zurria y sus aliados oficiales corruptos y funcionarios del gobierno.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar es un drama épico ambientado en el siglo XVI que relata la historia sobre un matrimonio político de conveniencia entre un emperador mogol, Akbar y una princesa Rajput, Jodha Bai. La trama se centra en cómo éste matrimonio político trae el amor entre ellos en una medida que cambió el destino de la India, así mismo retrata las guerras de ese tiempo junto con las relaciones entre los mogoles y los Rajputs. Gran parte de la historia recrea el funcionamiento de las instituciones icónicas de la época como las reinas, los tribunales, las cortesanas, los ministros y su influencia en la historia de amor de Akbar y Jodha Bai. La serie también destaca cómo el Emperador Mogol Jalaluddin adquiere el título de Akbar del pueblo.

programme.title: Me Caíste Del Cielo
programme.desc: Una tragi-comedia en la que un hombre rescata al dueño de una taquería, quien se encuentra en inminente riesgo

programme.title: Agua en la Boca
programme.desc: Es una historia de amor prohibido entre dos jóvenes, hijos de familias rivales. La hermosa Danielle Cassoulet (de descendencia francés) y el aventurero Luca Bellini (de descendencia italiana). El conflicto entre el cassoulet y la familia Bellini es viejo, siendo antes los mejores amigos de la juventud las matriarcas de esas familias hoy no pueden permanecer de pie debido a una disputa amorosa en el pasado en el que Françoise Cassoulet, y la abuela de Dany se peleaban por el amor de un mismo hombre.

programme.title: El Mono
programme.desc: A dos medio hermanas la vida les dará un giro radical luego de evento dramático.

programme.title: El Talisman
programme.desc: Tras perder un rancho en Texas, Camila Nájera y su familia se mudan a Fresno, California. El destino los llevará a ser vecinos del despiadado Gregorio Negrete, dueño del rancho "El Alcatraz". Gregorio ha vivido en guerra con Los Aceves, antiguos dueños de "El Talismán", y su único sueño es poseer ese rancho. Camila se verá envuelta en este juego de ambición y poder, que la lleva a conocer a dos hombres que le cambiarán la vida.

programme.title: Víctimas Del Divorcio
programme.desc: Cuando tres es multitud.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: Pan-soo, a successful businessman in his 40s, is hit on the ground by a person falling from a building. Waking up, he finds himself in another body. Now Pan-soo has to be Dong- hyun, a high school student who gets bullied frequently. He finds out Dong-hyun tried to help a girl, Hyun-jung, and fell off the building. When he meets her mother, Mi-sun, he immediately knows that Hyun-jeong is his daughter. To get close to Hyun-jung, Pan-soo takes hard physical training with her.

We’ve got a lot of prizes ready for those who participate on After School Club, so if you want to make some special memories, don’t hesitate!

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E181
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE is guitarist and singer-songwriter Jukjae! This artist initially made his reputation in the music scene as a session guitarist, composer, and arranger. Then in April 2014, he released a self-written song "View" through the compilation album, "bright #2," and his debut album, "One Word," in November, officially starting a singing career of his own. Thanks to his dexterity in playing guitar, he has played with a number of top musicians, including Park Hyo-shin, Kim Dong-ryul, IU and more. Last month in November, Jukjae released his second mini-album, "2006," the year Jukjae describes as “the most beautiful and innocent time” in his life. With the lead single, "Shining, My 2006," he hopes people will look back at the time they were at their brightest and happiest, to escape reality for a brief moment. In this episode, Jukjae performs "Shining, My 2006," "The Door," "Do You Want To Walk With Me?" "Let's Go See the Stars," and "View." Tune in to "I'm LIVE" and take a glimpse into his artistry!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Sid Davis - Baggage Claim
programme.desc: This former airline worker hilariously unloads side-splitting baggage on stage. Sid's humor is fueled with A.D.D., a wavering ego, and a grade school teacher wife who views him as a child left behind.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tony Deyo - Sleep When The Baby Sleeps
programme.desc: Tony Deyo is a stand-up comedian known most notably for his sharp, quick material and near-perfect comedic timing almost certainly gained from his years as a professional symphony musician. New York City’s Village Voice calls him “one of the tightest joke writers in the business.” In 2013, he made his late night television debut on CONAN. Within a year, he had added appearances on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, AXS TV’s Gotham Comedy Live, and Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen. His latest album, Comedy Road Trip, landed on the Billboard Magazine comedy chart and debuted as the #1 selling stand-up album on iTunes. With over 50 stand-up clips available, he has steadily become one of the most prolific comedians on YouTube. He performed at the prestigious HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, was named one of the year's best by the New York Post, and can be heard regularly on SiriusXM Satellite Radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brian Bates - Uber Important
programme.desc: Turning to comedy after twenty years in corporate America, Brian Bates jokes about ubering his hecklers home, meeting women while hiking, and people who dont believe in God but do believe in wrestling.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Johnny Beehner - The Flamingo Special
programme.desc: Johnny Beehner puts on a funny show. He's got everything you want from a comic: He's silly, he’s likeable, and he's fun. With a background in improvisational theater including training at Chicago’s prestigious Second City, as well as the Upright Citizens Brigade in Los Angeles, Johnny brings a unique style to the stage. Beehner made his network television debut in January of 2015 as one of the last comedians to appear on the Late Show with David Letterman. He has made numerous appearances on FOX "Laughs" television show, and regularly appears on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Show. His comedy can be heard regularly on XM/ Sirius Satellite radio. Other notable and accomplishments of Johnny's include winning First place in Comcast's 2014 season of "Trial By Laughter," placing third in the 2014 “Laughing Skull Comedy Festival” of Atlanta, and making it to the finals in the 2012 “Great American Comedy Festival”. He was named one of Ricky Gervais' Top 5 picks in the "Just Sayin” stand up contest. Johnny was recently named one of 2015's Top10, "Hot Comics to Watch" by his wife. She says that he would have a shot at the #1 spot if he would “work just a little bit harder”. He's a married man, a new dad, and his current life goal is to win just one argument with his beautiful wife.

programme.title: Jason Hewlett - Father Time
programme.desc: The Award-Winning One-Man Show of Jason Hewlett The Entertainer will have you laughing until it hurts. Comedy, Music, Impressions, and Standing Ovations make Jason the perfect entertainer. His brand of Hilarious G-Rated Entertainment is unlike anything you have ever enjoyed. Over 2,000 shows for more than 1 Million audience members in his incredible career make Jasonís show an event you will remember for years to come.

programme.title: Matt Falk - Un-Lit
programme.desc: Matt Falk was called “effortlessly funny” by the CBC. He’s performed at Just For Laughs, The Hal!fax Comedy Festival and the Winnipeg Comedy Festival. He was recently named one of the “Best of the Fest” at the Burbank Comedy Festival in California.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Alex Velluto - Thirsty
programme.desc: Alex Velluto is a stand-up comedian and Diet Coke drinker from Salt Lake City, Utah. He has performed at comedy festivals all over the country including the Boston Comedy Festival, Big Sky Comedy Festival, and the Seattle International Comedy Competition. He was named “Best of Fest” at the Golden Spike Comedy Festival and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. In 2016, Alex was voted “Best Comedian” by City Weekly Magazine. His debut comedy special “Alex Velluto: Spurious” is currently streaming on Amazon.com.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Christian Pieper - Glutton for Punishment
programme.desc: Christian Pieper is an award-winning and crowd-pleasing comedian from Beaver Dam, Kentucky, now living in Los Angeles. In just five years as a performer, Christian has quickly earned acclaim for his honest, smart, and welcoming approach to personal material, layering unexpectedly subversive observations on current events, culture, and relationships.A two-time semifinalist in the prestigious Boston Comedy Festival, hes also been featured in the Crossroads Comedy Festival, Burbank Comedy Festival, and other festivals and competitions across the country. Christian has also performed abroad, having done shows for troops and civilians in eight different countries, and was a guest on the Bob & Tom show. He currently hosts and produces Adrenaline, a comedy-challenge show presented regularly at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Salt Lake City and the Hollywood Improv.

programme.title: Jason Love - Jokes On Me
programme.desc: One of today's busiest comics, Jason Love has appeared on HBO, Comedy Central, America's Got Talent, and over 20 national broadcasts.Jason works clean and incorporates music, making him a favorite for companies like Google, Chevron, Farmers, and Costco.Says L.A. Weekly: "Jason Love is comedy that brings people together."From the Hollywood Improv to Carolines on Broadway, Jasons audience continues to grow. He has performed overseas for the troops and on the seas for cruise lines. Jason was a finalist at the Cabo Comedy Festival and at the World Series of Comedy in Vegas.Jasons non-profit, Love &amp Laughter, brings free shows to cancer support communities and others in need. His podcast is produced by Levity Entertainment. He is represented by Don Casino Productions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Shayne Smith - Prison for Wizards
programme.desc: Former Gang Member, current comedian, future famous comedian. Shayne Smith is the runner up in the Wiseguys’ 2015 Funniest Person In Utah competition, winner of the 2015 Salt City Comedy Superstar contest and most recently voted best Alternative Comedian of 2016 by City Weekly.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Andrew Hobbs - A Joke Unless it Works
programme.desc: Have you ever, as an adult, been bullied by a healthcare professional or popular middle school girl? Andrew has. The comedy of Andrew Hobbs encapsulates the bizarre awkwardness of belated maturity and his attempts to appear in control. Andrew will have you rolling with laughter as he twists a narrative of humor and heart from his own life experiences and observations. His comedy has been featured in comedy festivals across the country. He has been perfecting his craft since childhood and throughout adulthood.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Eric O Shea - Life: It's Not Your Fault
programme.desc: Eric O'Shea has been active in the comedy business for 25 years. He has performed in L.A. with Betty White at the Creative Emmy Awards and has appeared on America's Got Talent TV Show. Every year since 1997, Eric has performed an average of 70 shows a year, and has received 7 nominations as the “National College Comedian of the Year”

programme.desc: Join former MST3K stars Mike, Kevin, and Bill and have a blast with the meandering, low-impact heroics of Superargo and the Faceless Giants! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (former stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 aka MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Paper and I
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short all about a little boy and his talking paper bag. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they fly off to the forests of the American South for Paper and I!

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Junior Prom
programme.desc: This movie has it all and then some: romance, political intrigue, studying, rich uncles, big bands, familial strife, journalism, jazz, soda fountains, swing dance, real estate, and a prom! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Bridget and Mary Jo from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - A Day of Thanksgiving
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short about the true meaning of Thanksgiving. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill at the table for A Day of Thanksgiving!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Blood Theater
programme.desc: Every time the Blood Theatre has opened for business, someone has died. But this time, the most incompetent theater owner in town has a good feeling about his chances! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Library World
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the short Library World! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill as they step into Library World!

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Hangar 18
programme.desc: Hangar 18 tells the story of a vast cover-up involving a crashed UFO, and lots and lots of mustaches.This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Matthew J. Elliot and Ian Potter from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Shake Hands With Danger
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this safety short Shake Hands With Danger! Mike, Kevin and Bill have never shaken hands with Danger, but they did give Danger that "fist bump then explosion" thing, and then Danger called them all "Bro-seph."

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Sons Of Hercules
programme.desc: Everyone knows Hercules (or Heracles, if you’re really fun to talk to at parties), the mighty Greek whose heroic exploits included cleaning up tons of horse crap. But not everyone knows his sons, who for some reason went by the name The Sons of Hercules! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for The Sons of Hercules!
